sentences.en: After years of belittlement and repressed emotions , she finds herself no courage.
sentences.cn: 自从最近与男友分开以来, 她一直心烦意乱.

sentences.en: Anger repressed can poison a relationship as surely as the cruelest words.
sentences.cn: 被压抑的愤怒确实会像最残酷的字眼一样毒害关系.

sentences.en: Bertha repressed her gaiety and began to eat.
sentences.cn: 伯莎抑止住逗乐的情绪,开始吃饭.

sentences.en: He flew into hardly repressed passion, and wished himself clear of the whole household.
sentences.cn: 他几乎不加克制地大发雷霆, 但愿自己和这个家一刀两断.

sentences.en: He repressed this first, generous instinct, and recoiled before heroism.
sentences.cn: 他抑制了最初的那种慷慨心情,在英雄主义面前退缩了.

sentences.en: It is anger that is repressed that leads to violence and loss of control.
sentences.cn: 是被压制的愤怒导致暴力和失控。

sentences.en: It must be quickly and sternly repressed.
sentences.cn: 此事自应迅速予以严厉的制裁.

sentences.en: The desire - sober and repressed - of Elizabeth - Jane's heart was indeed to see, to hear, and to understand.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白 - 简斯内心里受着压抑而朴实的欲念,确是看得出 、 听得见, 可以令人理解.

sentences.en: The little boy repressed by his parents and seldom spoke.
sentences.cn: 这个小男孩受到父母的约束,很少讲话.

sentences.en: Their repressed emotions were ignited by her fiery speech.
sentences.cn: 她火爆的发言激起了他们压抑的情绪.

sentences.en: Their voices, their very glances, became furtive and repressed.
sentences.cn: 他们说话的声音, 他们的眼光, 变得那么提心吊胆,拘拘束束的.

sentences.en: They set the shop on fire to blow off their repressed emotion.
sentences.cn: 他们放火烧商店,以发泄压抑的情绪.

sentences.en: We hindered and repressed a great deal of cruelty.
sentences.cn: 我们防止和制止了许多暴虚事件.

sentences.en: When positive transformation occurs, the criminal motivation is repressed.
sentences.cn: 当发生正面转化的时候, 犯罪动机被压抑下去.

words.tran_cn: 重压；补加压力；[机] 再压
抑制，[心理] 压抑；镇压
抑制；镇压；约束（repress的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: having feelings or desires that you do not allow yourself to express or think about, especially sexual feelings

trans.tran_cn: 抑制( repress的过去式和过去分词 )，约束，镇压，制止
